definitions.text: relating to or conferring immunity (to disease or infection)
able to tolerate environmental conditions or physiological stress
examples: the plant is tolerant of saltwater
these fish are quite tolerant as long as extremes of pH are avoided
the new hybrid is more resistant to drought
resistant to the effects of heat

definitions.text: disposed to or engaged in defiance of established authority
incapable of absorbing or mixing with
examples: plastic highly resistant to steam and water
